name: Fayne

skills.name: Exotic Blades
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 35% chance of stealing 5% of the target's current Turn Meter.

effects.notes: 2-hit multi-hit. 1.55x ATK per hit. 35% base (50% booked) TM steal per hit.
35% chance per hit (50% booked) to steal 5% current TM.

skills.notes: Multi-hit A1 synergizes with Giant Slayer (2 hits = ~51% proc). TM steal useful for CB/dungeons.

skills.name: Flower's Tears
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing two 5% [Poison] debuffs and a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 75% base (100% booked) chance to place TWO 5% Poison debuffs.
75% base (100% booked) chance to place 50% Dec ATK.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +20% damage, +25% debuff chance (75%→100%), -1 turn cooldown (4→3). Essential for Clan Boss.
skills.notes: Core Clan Boss skill. Two 5% Poisons + Dec ATK. Must book for 100% debuff chance and 3-turn cooldown for speed tuning.

skills.name: Flowing Style
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 3 turns. The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 3 turns. The third hit heals this Champion by 4% of her MAX HP for every debuff on the target.

effects.notes: First hit: 75% base (100% booked) chance to place 60% Dec DEF for 3 turns.
Second hit: 75% base (100% booked) chance to place 25% Weaken for 3 turns.
Third hit: heals 4% MAX HP per debuff on target (up to 10 debuffs = 40% MAX HP heal).

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +10% damage, +25% debuff chance (75%→100%), -1 turn cooldown (5→4). Must book for Clan Boss Dec DEF/Weaken reliability.
skills.notes: Elite Clan Boss debuffer. Dec DEF + Weaken = massive team damage boost. Self-heal scales with debuff count (10 debuffs = 40% heal). 3-hit multi-hit synergizes with Giant Slayer.

forms.comments: One of the best Epic Clan Boss champions. Elite debuffer (Dec DEF, Weaken, Poison, Dec ATK). Multi-hit A1/A3 synergize with Giant Slayer. Must fully book for 100% debuff chances and speed tuning.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: PRIORITY: 250+ ACC (reliable debuffs), 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD (speed tuning), 70%+ C.DMG, 2500+ DEF (survivability). Lifesteal set for sustain.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, 100% C.RATE, DEF%/HP% for survivability. Savage or Cruel sets for damage.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: Low priority. If used: 250+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, C.DMG focus.

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1 'Exotic Blades' attacks 2 times, A3 'Flowing Style' attacks 3 times, 30% proc per hit). Multi-hit champion = Giant Slayer optimal.
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution (if Lifesteal), Deterrence

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL - multi-hit A1/A3 synergy), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC for 250+ total), Lore of Steel, MASTER HEXER (CRITICAL - extends Poison/Dec DEF/Weaken/Dec ATK), Cycle of Magic (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, Methodical, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1/A3 multi-hit)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL - multi-hit synergy), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL - +50 ACC), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer (extends debuffs), Cycle of Violence
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, HELMSMASHER (Ignore DEF burst) OR Giant Slayer
SUPPORT: Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, Cycle of Violence
doom_tower: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1/A3 multi-hit)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, Bring it Down, GIANT SLAYER (CRITICAL - A1/A3 multi-hit)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, SWARM SMITER (CRITICAL), Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (CRITICAL), Lore of Steel, Master Hexer
masteries.general: Giant Slayer CRITICAL (A1 attacks 2 times, A3 attacks 3 times = multi-hit, 30% proc per hit). Master Hexer CRITICAL (extends Poison/Dec DEF/Weaken/Dec ATK for massive team damage boost). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for 250+ total). Swarm Smiter CRITICAL (multi-hit A1/A3 synergy). Must book A2/A3 for 100% debuff chances and speed tuning.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A2/A3 when available, prioritizing debuff application. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. Pure damage/debuffer for Clan Boss.

mechanics_advisory: TOP-TIER Clan Boss Epic champion. Elite debuffer with Dec DEF + Weaken + Poison + Dec ATK. Multi-hit A1/A3 synergize perfectly with Giant Slayer for massive boss damage. MUST BOOK A2/A3 for 100% debuff reliability and speed tuning (A2: 4→3 turns, A3: 5→4 turns). Requires 250+ ACC for endgame Clan Boss. Lifesteal set mandatory for sustainability. Self-heal on A3 scales with debuff count. User Priority: Clan Boss UNM (Priority 1) - Fayne is MUST-BUILD for UNM teams. Pair with Dec DEF/Weaken champions or use as primary debuffer. Skinwalkers Faction Wars viable (8/10).
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Clan Boss UNM specialist. One of the best Epic champions for Clan Boss damage and debuff utility. Must book A2/A3. Giant Slayer + Master Hexer + Eagle Eye are non-negotiable masteries.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from Ayumilove (standard Epic ATK champion base stats at 60)
